description: Grafana dashboard for Twingate Kubernetes Access Gateway

panels.description: Total number of scrapes by HTTP status code.
panels.title: HTTP Status

panels.description: Total number of internal errors encountered by the promhttp metric handler.
panels.title: Error

panels.description: Current number of scrapes being served
panels.title: Number of active scrapes

panels.description: Total number of HTTP requests handled by the Gateway, grouped by request type, status code and request method.
panels.title: Total Requests

panels.description: Number of currently active (in-progress) HTTP requests between Client and Gateway.
panels.title: Active Requests

panels.description: Percentile latency of HTTP requests between Client and Gateway, grouped by request type.
panels.title: Request Latency

panels.description: Average request durations between Client and Gateway, grouped by request type, status code and request method.

targets.expr: sum by(code, type, method) (rate(twingate_gateway_http_request_duration_seconds_sum[5m])) / sum by(code, type, method) (rate(twingate_gateway_http_request_duration_seconds_count[5m]))

panels.title: Request Duration (Average)

panels.description: Percentile size of HTTP requests by Client, grouped by request type.
panels.title: Request Size (Percentile)

panels.description: Average size of HTTP requests by Client, grouped by request type, status code and request method.

targets.expr: sum by(code, method, type) (rate(twingate_gateway_http_request_size_bytes_sum[5m])) / sum by(code, method, type) (rate(twingate_gateway_http_request_size_bytes_count[5m]))

panels.title: Request Size (Average)

panels.description: Percentile size of HTTP responses handled by Gateway, grouped by request type.
panels.title: Response Size (Percentile)

panels.description: Average size of HTTP response handled by Gateway, grouped by request type, status code and request method.

targets.expr: sum by(code, method, type) (rate(twingate_gateway_http_response_size_bytes_sum[5m])) / sum by(code, method, type) (rate(twingate_gateway_http_response_size_bytes_count[5m]))

panels.title: Response Size (Average)

panels.description: Total number of HTTP requests handled by the Kubernetes API Server, grouped by request type, method and status code.
panels.title: Total Requests

panels.description: Number of currently active (in-progress) HTTP requests to Kubernetes API server.
panels.title: Active Requests

panels.description: Percentile latency of HTTP requests to Kubernetes API Server, grouped by request type.
panels.title: Request Duration (Percentile)

panels.description: Average request durations between Client and Gateway, grouped by request type, status code and request method.

targets.expr: sum by(code, type, method) (rate(twingate_gateway_api_server_request_duration_seconds_sum[5m])) / sum by(code, type, method) (rate(twingate_gateway_api_server_request_duration_seconds_count[5m]))

panels.title: Request Duration (Average)

panels.description: Percentile latency of the recorded session.
panels.title: Duration (Percentile)

panels.description: Average durations of the recorded session.
panels.title: Duration (Average)

panels.description: Total number of Client TCP connections to Gateway, grouped by connection category.
panels.title: Total Connection

panels.description: Number of currently active (in-progress) Client TCP connections to Gateway.
panels.title: Active Connections

panels.description: Percentile latency of Client TCP connections to Gateway, grouped by connection category.
panels.title: Duration (Percentile)

panels.description: Average durations of Client TCP connections to Gateway, grouped by connection category.
panels.title: Duration (Average)

panels.description: Total number of HTTP Connect authentication attempts, grouped by status code.
panels.title: Total Authentication

panels.description: Percentile latency of HTTP Connect authentication attempts.
panels.title: Duration (Percentile)

panels.description: Average durations of HTTP Connect authentication attempts, grouped by status code.
panels.title: Duration (Average)

title: Twingate Kubernetes Access Gateway
